column4: Ok, next stupid question. Anyone know how I get rid of the system beep when modprobe tries to load blacklisted modules?
There's a few modules that used to not be able to be loaded in Warty, it seems they're blacklisted now.
Remember to upgrade kernel when you upgrade the system, as apt won't.
Ndiswrapper causes issues with my keyboard on my box.
I get random repeats of characters.
Note to anyone here, make sure you change your cron when you install Tiger.
I've got like 200 mail messages from Tiger, one every two hours for the last week.
And mail doesn't support mass delete
Ohh echo, how I love you.
Tiger isn't mailing anyone via cron, here.
No, > drops privs. And you can write to your own mail file ANWYAY.
I'm just in the habit of sudoing when I write to anywhere but home.
